sentences: Meie esimene kohtumine oli väga meeldejääv.
Nad otsustasid ära jätta oma regulaarse kohtumise.
context: The Estonian word 'kohtumine' means a meeting or encounter between people. It is derived from the verb root 'kohtu(ma)' (to meet) and the noun-forming suffix '-mine'. The word can refer to planned meetings, scheduled appointments, or chance encounters. In its different grammatical forms, it follows Estonian declension patterns: genitive form 'kohtumise', partitive form 'kohtumist', plural nominative 'kohtumised'.
